title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1151.7 - Littering
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1151.7 - Littering

State Regulations

No person shall place, discharge or deposit in any manner
rubbish, garbage, waste material or any refuse whatsoever, at any
transportation facility except at such place or places as the authority may
from time to time prescribe. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1151.7

Amended, New

York State Register May 14, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 19, eff. 5/14/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
